channel.title: Accessibility on Video Translator
channel.description: Recent content in Accessibility on Video Translator

item.title: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued
item.description: At VideoTranslator, we do a lot of work with clients who are part of the healthcare ecosystem. That being said, we are not transcribers, translators, voice over artists, or in this case, nurses/doctors. We use AI to do transcription, translation and synthetic (AI) dubbing - we are technologists who are trying to service our clients to the best of our ability. Every now and then a story turns up which brings a lot of our work into sharp focus.
